def_cn: 欣欣向荣;茁壮成长;兴旺发达
def_en: If someone or something thrives, they do well and are successful, healthy, or strong.

def_cn: (尤指在别人觉得困难的时候)以…为乐，可以出色应对
def_en: If you say that someone thrives on a particular situation, you mean that they enjoy it or that they can deal with it very well, especially when other people find it unpleasant or difficult.
